pkgmetadata.longdescription: A GUI for the UNU.RAN Random Variate Generators // A GUI (Graphical User Interface) for the UNU.RAN random variate generators. Thus it allows to build non-uniform random number generators interactively for quite arbitrary distributions. In addition, R code for the required calls from package Runuran can be displayed and stored for later use. Some basic analysis like goodness-of-fit tests can be performed.
